sentences.en: According to the theory of relativity, nothing can travel faster than light.
sentences.cn: 根据相对论，任何东西都无法超越光速。

sentences.en: Einstein's theory of relativity won for him universal esteem.
sentences.cn: 爱因斯坦的相对论赢得了全世界对他的崇敬。

sentences.en: My colleague mentioned how the theory of relativity completely changed the field of physics.
sentences.cn: 我的同事提到了相对论如何彻底改变了物理学领域。
